channel.title: Hello, I'm Glenn from Caffeinated Tech
channel.description:
I've already read through several of the posts here and have already learnt a few things!
A few years ago, I already tried setting up a consulting business with the aim to transition into products as income increased. Alas, it didn't work for various reasons, a number of which were out of my control but forced me to take a *day-job* again to get back on my feet. I now refer to these experiences as **business school**! ;-)
I am now getting back into development and preparing to start bootstrapping again while keeping my current dayjob. I have been feeling motivated by listening to both the Bootstrapped podcast and [Quit!][1]
[1]: http://5by5.tv/quit

item.title: Hello, I'm Glenn from Caffeinated Tech
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Hi Glenn. Welcome to the forums, and good luck to you on your new bootstrapping efforts. Let us know how it goes!

Read full topic
item.source: Hello, I'm Glenn from Caffeinated Tech
